overview: This glorious three-act ballet (danced by outstanding members of the Bolshoi Ballet corps) boasts a magical score by Alexander Glazunov and is brimming with melody, stunning color and eye-popping effects. Starring Ludmila Semenyaka, Irek Moukhamedov and Gedeminas Taranda, the performance was filmed live at the Bolshoi Theater in Moscow.
title: Raymonda: Bolshoi Ballet
